login.title: Ikaze kuri VeriVote

error.title: Kwinjira Byanze
error.pending: Kwiyandikisha kwawe kuracyategereje kwemezwa. Nyamuneka, ongera ugerageze nyuma.
error.rejected: Kwiyandikisha kwawe kwaranze. Nyamuneka, vugana n'umuyobozi kugirango agufashe.
error.invalid: Amakuru y'injira atariyo. Nyamuneka, reba imeyili yawe n'ijambobanga.
error.no_role: Konti yawe y'umukoresha ntabwo yashyizweho neza. Nyamuneka, vugana n'abashinzwe ubufasha.

login.admin_official_info: Abayobozi n'abakozi bakoresha amakuru yabo bahawe kugirango binjire.

register.title: Kwiyandikisha kw'Abatora
register.description: Shyiramo amakuru yawe kugirango ufungure konti.
register.method_photo_desc: Ku batora bari mu turere twatoranyijwe. Bisaba kohereza indangamuntu ya leta.
register.method_phone_desc: Ku bandi bakoresha bose. Bisaba imeyili na nimero ya telefone bikora kugira ngo haboneke ubutumwa bugufi bwo kwemeza.

success_phone.title: Kwiyandikisha Birangiye!
success_phone.description: Telefone yawe yemejwe kandi konti yawe irakora!
